name: WallColossal
description: Represents a WallColossal character. Only character owner can modify fields and call functions unless otherwise specified.

instanceFields.label: HandHealth
instanceFields.description: Colossal's current hand health (applies to both hands for backward compatibility).

instanceFields.label: MaxHandHealth
instanceFields.description: Colossal's maximum hand health (applies to both hands for backward compatibility).

instanceFields.label: LeftHandState
instanceFields.description: Colossal's left hand state (Healthy or Broken).

instanceFields.label: RightHandState
instanceFields.description: Colossal's right hand state (Healthy or Broken).

instanceFields.label: HandRecoveryTime
instanceFields.description: Time in seconds for a hand to fully recover from broken state.

instanceFields.label: LeftHandRecoveryTimeLeft
instanceFields.description: Time remaining in seconds for left hand to recover (0 if not recovering).

instanceFields.label: RightHandRecoveryTimeLeft
instanceFields.description: Time remaining in seconds for right hand to recover (0 if not recovering).

instanceFields.label: WallAttackCooldown
instanceFields.description: Colossal's (AI) wall attack cooldown per attack.

instanceFields.label: SteamState
instanceFields.description: Colossal's current steam state (Off, Warning, or Damage).

instanceMethods.label: AttackSteam
instanceMethods.description: Causes the colossal to perform steam attack.

instanceMethods.label: StopSteam
instanceMethods.description: Causes the colossal to stop steam attack.

instanceMethods.label: WallAttack
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) colossal to perform a random wall attack.
